## What's Changed
* [(feat): Enable Exception Replay in Lambda ](https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/592)
* [fix: safely getting all the values for trigger tags (](https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/commit/9b694f7e25c58e9cbffb97392145c6962747fa87)
